languages.text: {n}Бледная фигура с неестественно вытянутыми конечностями закрывает лицо руками, искаженными острыми когтями. Ее мертвенно-бледное лицо измазано в крови, что нескончаемым потоком стекает из застланных алой пеленой глаз. Шипастые жабры, прикрытые спутанными волосами, нервно подергиваются при вашем приближении{/n}.

traits.locale_text: {n}Бледная фигура с неестественно вытянутыми конечностями стоит, вкинув искаженные острыми когтями руки. Ее мертвенно-бледное лицо измазано в крови, что нескончаемым потоком стекает из застланых алой пеленой глаз. Шипастые жабры, прикрытые спутанными волосами, нервно подергиваются при вашем приближении{/n}.

languages.text: {n}The pale figure with unnaturally long limbs covers her face with her hands, which are deformed with talon-like nails. Her deathly pale face is coated with blood that continually streams from her scarlet-misted eyes. Her spiny gills, slightly hidden under her dishevelled hair, twitch nervously at your approach.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Бледная фигура с неестественно вытянутыми конечностями закрывает лицо руками, искаженными острыми когтями. Ее мертвенно-бледное лицо измазано в крови, что нескончаемым потоком стекает из застланных алой пеленой глаз. Шипастые жабры, прикрытые спутанными волосами, нервно подергиваются при вашем приближении{/n}.

traits.locale_text: {n}The pale figure with unnaturally long limbs stands with her arms raised, her hands deformed with talon-like nails. Her deathly pale face is coated with blood that continually streams from her scarlet-misted eyes. Her spiny gills, slightly hidden under her dishevelled hair, twitch nervously at your approach.{/n}

Her deathly pale face is coated with blood that continually streams from her scarlet-misted eyes. Her spiny gills, slightly hidden under her dishevelled hair, twitch nervously at your approach.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一个苍白的身影出现在你面前，四肢修长得异乎寻常。她正高举着畸形的双手，上面长着利爪般的指甲。她的双眼仿佛笼罩在血色的迷雾中，鲜血不断地从双眼中流，流满了她如同死人般的苍白面孔。长着刺的腮部隐藏在她凌乱的头发下面。当你接近时，她的腮部紧张地抽动着。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pale figure with unnaturally long limbs covers her face with her hands, which are deformed with talon-like nails. Her deathly pale face is coated with blood that continually streams from her scarlet-misted eyes. Her spiny gills, slightly hidden under her dishevelled hair, twitch nervously at your approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一个苍白的身影出现在你面前，四肢修长得异乎寻常。她正高举着畸形的双手，上面长着利爪般的指甲。她的双眼仿佛笼罩在血色的迷雾中，鲜血不断地从双眼中流，流满了她如同死人般的苍白面孔。长着刺的腮部隐藏在她凌乱的头发下面。当你接近时，她的腮部紧张地抽动着。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La figura pálida con extremidades inhumanamente largas se tapa la cara con manos deformadas por uñas como garras. Su rostro, pálido como un cadáver, está empapado con la sangre que fluye constantemente de sus ojos teñidos de escarlata. Sus branquias espinosas, medio ocultas bajo su pelo desaliñado, se contraen con nerviosismo cuando te acercas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pale figure with unnaturally long limbs covers her face with her hands, which are deformed with talon-like nails. Her deathly pale face is coated with blood that continually streams from her scarlet-misted eyes. Her spiny gills, slightly hidden under her dishevelled hair, twitch nervously at your approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La figura pálida con extremidades inhumanamente largas se tapa la cara con manos deformadas por uñas como garras. Su rostro, pálido como un cadáver, está empapado con la sangre que fluye constantemente de sus ojos teñidos de escarlata. Sus branquias espinosas, medio ocultas bajo su pelo desaliñado, se contraen con nerviosismo cuando te acercas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}不自然なほど長い手足を持つ青白い人物は、鉤爪のように変形した爪が生えた両手でその顔を覆っている。死人と思えるほど青白い顔には血が滲み、緋色に濁った目からは絶えず血が流れている。トゲのついたエラが乱れた髪の下にわずかに見え、あなたの接近に神経質に痙攣している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pale figure with unnaturally long limbs covers her face with her hands, which are deformed with talon-like nails. Her deathly pale face is coated with blood that continually streams from her scarlet-misted eyes. Her spiny gills, slightly hidden under her dishevelled hair, twitch nervously at your approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}不自然なほど長い手足を持つ青白い人物は、鉤爪のように変形した爪が生えた両手でその顔を覆っている。死人と思えるほど青白い顔には血が滲み、緋色に濁った目からは絶えず血が流れている。トゲのついたエラが乱れた髪の下にわずかに見え、あなたの接近に神経質に痙攣している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die fahle Gestalt mit unnatürlich langen Gliedern bedeckt ihr Gesicht mit ihren Händen, die durch klauenartige Nägel entstellt sind. Ihr leichenblasses Gesicht ist mit Blut überzogen, das ständig aus ihren rötlich getrübten Augen strömt. Die stacheligen Kiemen, die unter ihrem zerzausten Haar versteckt sind, zucken nervös, als du dich näherst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pale figure with unnaturally long limbs covers her face with her hands, which are deformed with talon-like nails. Her deathly pale face is coated with blood that continually streams from her scarlet-misted eyes. Her spiny gills, slightly hidden under her dishevelled hair, twitch nervously at your approach.{/n}

Die stacheligen Kiemen, die unter ihrem zerzausten Haar versteckt sind, zucken nervös, als du dich näherst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La silhouette blême aux membres anormalement longs se couvre le visage de ses mains difformes aux ongles acérés. Son visage d'une extrême pâleur est inondé par le sang qui coule de ses yeux écarlates embués. Ses branchies effilées, légèrement dissimulées sous ses cheveux en désordre, tressaillent nerveusement à votre approche.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pale figure with unnaturally long limbs covers her face with her hands, which are deformed with talon-like nails. Her deathly pale face is coated with blood that continually streams from her scarlet-misted eyes. Her spiny gills, slightly hidden under her dishevelled hair, twitch nervously at your approach.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Olağan dışı ölçülerde uzun uzuvlara sahip solgun kadın, pençe benzeri tırnaklara sahip elleriyle yüzünü kapatıyor. Ölüm gibi solgun yüzü, kızıl puslu gözlerinden devamlı akan kanla kaplı. Dağınık saçlarının hafifçe içine gömülmüş dikenli solungaçları, sen yaklaşırken gergin bir şekilde seğiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pale figure with unnaturally long limbs covers her face with her hands, which are deformed with talon-like nails. Her deathly pale face is coated with blood that continually streams from her scarlet-misted eyes. Her spiny gills, slightly hidden under her dishevelled hair, twitch nervously at your approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Olağan dışı ölçülerde uzun uzuvlara sahip solgun şahıs, kollarını kaldırmış bir hâlde duruyor. Elleri, pençe benzeri tırnaklarıyla deforme olmuş durumda. Ölüm gibi solgun yüzü, kızıl puslu gözlerinden devamlı akan kanla kaplı. Dağınık saçlarının hafifçe içine gömülmüş dikenli solungaçları, sen yaklaşırken gergin bir şekilde seğiriyor.{/n}
